00075     long getUniqueAirFrameId(){
00076 
00077       // if counter has done one complete cycle and will be set to a value it already had
00078       if (airFrameId == -1){
00079         // print a warning
00080         ev << "WARNING: AirFrameId-Counter has done one complete cycle."
00081         << " AirFrameIds are repeating now and may not be unique anymore." << endl;
00082       }
00083 
00084       return airFrameId++;
00085     }
00086  };
